headline: HONEYWELL ACQUIRES SPARKMETER'S DATA PLATFORM AND SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES TO STRENGTHEN ITS PORTFOLIO OF UTILITY SOLUTIONS
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced the expansion of its Smart Energy portfolio with the tuck-in acquisition of three utility platforms from SparkMeter, Inc., a provider of leading grid management solutions for utilities. The acquisition includes intellectual property as well as certain related assets from SparkMeter.
